documents.title: Conversion Tool - TPT
documents.content:
List of views: ,,,,

,Name,Questions answered:,,

View 1: ,Conversion rate per week,How is the blended CVR developing over the last weeks?,,

,,How is the traffic and # conversions developing in the last weeks?,,

,,,,

View 2: ,CVR per channel,How are particular channel groupings performing over time (weekly vs montly view)?,,

,,How are our channels contributing to overall conversion numbers?,,

,,,,

View 3: ,funnel blended (interactive),How is the micro conversion in every step of our funnel developing in the last months?,,

,,On which steps of the funnel are we loosing more customers than in previous weeks?,,

,,,,

View 3: ,"funnel blended (interactive, same functionality as slide 3, but with channel breakdown)",How is the micro conversion in every step of our funnel in X channel developing in the last months?,,

,,On which steps of the funnel from X channel are we loosing more customers than in previous weeks?,,

,,On which steps of the funnel from X channel are we loosing more customers than Y channel?,,

,,,,

View 5:,Slide 5: Seasonality: TPT vs other brands (Xbrand),How is TPT conversion rate performing vs other HFG brands?,,

,,Are there any signs of seasonality in TPT conversion rate?,,

,,,,

For clarification of the data sources logic check the DETAILS tab,,,,

,,,,

,,,,

,,,,

,,,,

,,,,

Action items LOG,,,,

1st of April meeting,,,,

View 1: ,View 2: ,View 3: ,View 4: ,View 5:

,,,Cade to check with First Media the drop of mCVR from LP to Quiz from March to April/May,

,,,Cade to check the CTA copy among competitors,

,,,Maria to create a view of the ,

,,,Add a breakdown by channel grouping to the new chart,

documents.title: Demo Session Sign-Up Sheet
documents.content:
,,,,,,,,,,

Date,Name of the Topic,Brief explanation (max. two sentences),Is it already in production?,Name of the Alliance/Tribe/Squad(s),Name of the Presenter(s),Link to relevant JIRA Ticket / Repository,Preliminary order for meeting ,Video Link,HM Followup,

12/2/2025,Merchandising Widgets,"Configurable merchandising widgets  in the new Elysium store. Markets can self service configure their own banners (essentially ""internal ads"") inside the store to foster menu exploration and promote specific categories. ",Yes,Customer Mega Alliance / Shopping Journey,Thomas Gamper Feitoza Shruti Patil,https://github.com/hellofresh/shared-mobile-modules,2,,x,

12/2/2025,"Deploying services with a brand, country and multi-region variation ","The multi-variant pipeline enables teams to configure and deploy the same application in multiple configurations within a single region, eliminating the need for separate deployments per country or brand. The multi-region pipeline enables teams to deploy their services in 3 regions, Europe, North America, Oceania, reducing the complexity of managing multiple deployments.
",Yes,Release Engineering- Foundations Alliance ,Lobna Naguib Richard Palm,https://github.com/hellofresh/ftcp-open-application-model/commit/9b3c5122a47c152a26229e59f21b1c1441f32927,5,,x,

12/2/2025,Databricks & Unity Catalog Platform Automation,"The current Databricks platform faces infrastructure, governance, and automation challenges, slowing onboarding and limiting features like Iceberg, interoperability, and databricks Compute and GenAI.This project introduces Unity Catalog and automates Databricks infrastructure to strengthen governance and improve team productivity",UAT,Data Streaming and Operations-Foundations Alliance ,Karunai Ragavan S,"https://github.com/hellofresh/databricks-automation
https://hellodev.hellofresh.io/project/databricks/docs/databricks-automation",,,o,

12/2/2025,Ad progression - customized funnels based on value propsitions,"Currently, this is very little connection between the marketing ad that a user clicks on and the conversion funnel. We are testing personalized funnels that dynamically change based on the message of the marketing ad a user clicks on (e.g.; users clicking on a health ad will go through a health-themed conversion funnel). ",Yes,"Conversion Comms Squad, Growth Alliance",Harneet Singh Alvaro Magalhaes,"Statsig 
JIRA (HF) 
JIRA (Factor) 
Slide deck",6,,x,

12/2/2025,Bulk Upload Recipe info in CCM,"The Bulk Upload feature allows you to update large amounts of recipe-level information—specifically pricing details (surcharge, mods), merchandising tags, and labels—for a full menu week using a single CSV file.

Goal: Save you up to X hours of manual configuration per week and keep our menus scalable and accurate.",Yes,Shopping Platform Team - Active Journey Alliance,Priyank Khanna Enrico Carraro João Cheffer Prado Brittney Barnes,CCM Bulk Upload on Menu's Recipes: Quick Start Guide for Editors (Beta),,,o,

12/2/2025,New Cooking Experince on the App ,,,"Growth Alliance, Active Journey Alliance ",Wladimir Gaus Srishti Shah,,1,,,

12/2/2025,Automated Cluster Physical Box Business Marts,"Launching 3 new Business marts covering Physical box concept for operational use cases across Automated Cluster DCs (end-to-end box journey, physical box products and complete BOM)",Yes ,Ops Intelligence/ Analytics Enablement,Alex Goodwin Dragos Simionescu Audrya Kerenhappukh Zauresh Zhumayeva ,https://github.com/hellofresh/ops-intelligence-ae/tree/ae4adfee4e21a973c35a0fe319123991f558fe44/snowflake/dbt/ops_intelligence/models/business_mart/order_creation,,,o,

12/2/2025,FreshChat on Hellodev,"Integrating FreshChat(ChatGpt for Hellofresh) interface into Hellodev to reduce friction, unify the Builder experience and get instant response",Yes,Foundations,TBD,"https://hellodev.hellofresh.io/chat

 Repo: https://github.com/hellofresh/hellodev/tree/master/plugins/fresh-chat",,,x,

12/2/2025,Olympus: Image RAG for Concorde,TBA,Yes,Operations Mega Alliance / Menu-To-Content + ML SOlutions,Benjamin Bertincourt Louis Lippmann,https://github.com/hellofresh/mls-genai-solutions,3,,x,

12/2/2025,P500 Funnel & Menu Personalization,"A new questionnaire where we ask prospects for their meal preferences like rating their proteins and cuisines, letting us know of ingredients to avoid, and nutrition goals.

Using this data that we're now storing, we've partnered with squad personalization to provide customers with a more personalized set of menu defaults and menu ranking.",Yes - Experiment,"Growth Mega Alliance / Conversions Tribe / Funnel Squad

Food Systems Alliance / Menu Personalization Tribe / Squad Personalization",Marie Crumpton Tommaso Cremonini Michael Johnson Alejandra Garcia Ashwin Samtani,"Jira Epic
Figma
Working Doc
Slide deck",4,,,x

1/13/2026,Menu Search,"To support menu discovery for P500, we built and launched a web-only MVP menu search feature for Chefs Plate, ran successful non-inferiority experiments in CK, CA and US and are now live for 100% in these markets. We gathered behavioral and survey data about how users use full text search to discover recipes.","Yes (CK, CA, US)",Consumer Mega Alliance,Stefano Palazzo Tushar Raina,https://github.com/hellofresh/web/blob/master/app/spaces/store/modules/food/shared/components/search,,,,

documents.title: KN - Reset To Trial Customers
documents.content:
,,,,,,,,,,,,,

,Purpose: ,,,,,,,,,,,,QUERY  into databricks

,,"New TPT customers who sign up are entitled to a ""Trial"" Box which is smaller in size and lower in price. Due to payment errors or CC/Logistics issues, trial boxes may get canceled. We need to send subscriptions who had their trial box cancelled due to payment error for the New Ventures Tech team to manually ""reset"" subscriptions back to the ""trial"" sku so that this price can be honored on the second box. Once a trial box has been reset for over 4 weeks and customer still has a failed payment, we want to cancel the subscription to avoid further weekly order creations.",,,,,,,,,,,WITH CanceledOrders AS (

,,,,,,,,,,,,,SELECT

,,,,,,,,,,,,,"subscription_id,"

,,,,,,,,,,,,,"customer_id,"

,,,,,,,,,,,,,COUNT(order_nr) AS total_canceled_orders

,,,,,,,,,,,,,FROM

,,,,,,,,,,,,,payments_hf.f_orders fo

,Standard of Procedure,,,,,,,,,,,,WHERE

,,,,,,,,,,,,,country = 'KN'

,1,"UPDATE QUERY to make sure hellofresh_delivery_week is CURRENT WEEK and delivery_date is after TODAY's date; Create a new tab in this sheet (i.e. ""2025_W49"")",,,,,,,,,,,"AND latest_status IN ('canceled', 'clarify_payment_error')"

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND box_shipped = 0

,2,"From the query results, cancel subscriptions where ""total_canceled_orders = 5+ cancelled orders"" using reason = ""CC-Failed-Payments"" and then delete from list.",,,,,,,,,,,AND product_type = 'mealbox'

,,Cancel subscriptions either individually or using bulk function on BOB,,,,,,,,,,,GROUP BY

,,,Using BOB bulk function:,,,,,,,,,,"fo.subscription_id, fo.customer_id"

,,,Create a CSV with the following headers: ,,,,,,,,,,)

,,,,id,customer_id,reason,,,,,,,SELECT DISTINCT

,,,,,,CC-Failed-Payments,,,,,,,"fo.subscription_id,"

,,,"Upload CSV file using BOB > Bulk > Import > New > Click ""Browse"" to select file > Under Operation, select ""Subscription Cancel"" > Validate > Click New again > Upload",,,,,,,,,,"fo.customer_id,"

,,,,,,,,,,,,,"soi.sku,"

,3,"In the ""CC KN Reset"" tab, look for new entries from CC (lines without WEEKNUM function), and amend these subscriptions to new tab (i.e. ""W10"")",,,,,,,,,,,fo.delivery_date

,,,,,,,,,,,,,",CASE"

,4,"Send a question via slack #squad-nv-pet-food, to have an engineer pick up this task. ",,,,,,,,,,,WHEN co.total_canceled_orders >= 5 THEN '5+ boxes cancelled'

,,,type in /new_issue,,,,,,,,,,ELSE co.total_canceled_orders

,,,Yes I want to create a new issue,,,,,,,,,,

,,,Issue Title: ,Reset subscriptions to trial,,,,,,,,,

,,,Select topic: Other,,,,,,,,,,END AS total_canceled_orders

,,,Priority:, High,,,,,,,,,from payments_hf.f_orders fo

,,,Description: subscription_ids found in column A of this spreadsheet <Paste link>,,,,,,,,,,LEFT JOIN canceledorders co ON fo.subscription_id = co.subscription_id

,,,Expected Behaviour:,Reset trial to subscription,,,,,,,,,LEFT JOIN dl_bob_live_non_pii.sales_order_item soi ON fo.subscription_id = soi.fk_subscription AND fo.country = soi.business_unit

,Schedule,,Actual Behaviour,Payment errors,,,,,,,,,LEFT JOIN dimensions.product_dimension pd ON soi.sku = pd.product_sku AND soi.business_unit = pd.country

,,"On Tuesday, we want to take the delivery_dates from Saturday to Tuesday (e.g. On Nov 25, 2025, we want to delivery_dates 2025-11-22 to 2025-11-25)",,,,,,,,,,,LEFT JOIN dl_bob_live_non_pii.subscription s ON soi.fk_subscription = s.id_subscription AND soi.business_unit = s.business_unit

,,"On Friday, we want to take the previous delivery_dates from Wednesday to Friday (e.g. On Nov 28, we want delivery_dates 2025-11-26 to 2025-11-28)",,,,,,,,,,,where fo.country = 'KN'

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND customer_loyalty = 0

,,,,,,,,,,,,,"AND latest_status NOT IN ('shipped','money_received')"

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND fo.box_shipped = 0

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND hellofresh_delivery_week >= '2025-W48' --update to current week

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND fo.delivery_date <= '2025-11-25' --update to today's date +1 day

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND fo.dunning_decision = 'cancel'

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND fo.product_type = 'mealbox'

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND pd.is_trialbox IS TRUE

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND soi.sku LIKE 'KN-T%'

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND s.canceled_at IS NULL

,,,,,,,,,,,,,ORDER BY

,,,,,,,,,,,,,total_canceled_orders DESC;

 Repo: https://github.com/hellofresh/hellodev/tree/master/plugins/fresh-chat",,,x,

12/2/2025,Olympus: Image RAG for Concorde,TBA,Yes,Operations Mega Alliance / Menu-To-Content + ML SOlutions,Benjamin Bertincourt Louis Lippmann,https://github.com/hellofresh/mls-genai-solutions,3,,x,

Using this data that we're now storing, we've partnered with squad personalization to provide customers with a more personalized set of menu defaults and menu ranking.",Yes - Experiment,"Growth Mega Alliance / Conversions Tribe / Funnel Squad

Figma

documents.title: KN - Reset To Trial Customers
documents.content:
,,,,,,,,,,,,,

,Purpose: ,,,,,,,,,,,,QUERY  into databricks

,,"New TPT customers who sign up are entitled to a ""Trial"" Box which is smaller in size and lower in price. Due to payment errors or CC/Logistics issues, trial boxes may get canceled. We need to send subscriptions who had their trial box cancelled due to payment error for the New Ventures Tech team to manually ""reset"" subscriptions back to the ""trial"" sku so that this price can be honored on the second box. Once a trial box has been reset for over 4 weeks and customer still has a failed payment, we want to cancel the subscription to avoid further weekly order creations.",,,,,,,,,,,WITH CanceledOrders AS (

,,,,,,,,,,,,,SELECT

,,,,,,,,,,,,,"subscription_id,"

,,,,,,,,,,,,,"customer_id,"

,,,,,,,,,,,,,COUNT(order_nr) AS total_canceled_orders

,,,,,,,,,,,,,FROM

,,,,,,,,,,,,,payments_hf.f_orders fo

,Standard of Procedure,,,,,,,,,,,,WHERE

,,,,,,,,,,,,,country = 'KN'

,1,"UPDATE QUERY to make sure hellofresh_delivery_week is CURRENT WEEK and delivery_date is after TODAY's date; Create a new tab in this sheet (i.e. ""2025_W49"")",,,,,,,,,,,"AND latest_status IN ('canceled', 'clarify_payment_error')"

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND box_shipped = 0

,2,"From the query results, cancel subscriptions where ""total_canceled_orders = 5+ cancelled orders"" using reason = ""CC-Failed-Payments"" and then delete from list.",,,,,,,,,,,AND product_type = 'mealbox'

,,Cancel subscriptions either individually or using bulk function on BOB,,,,,,,,,,,GROUP BY

,,,Using BOB bulk function:,,,,,,,,,,"fo.subscription_id, fo.customer_id"

,,,Create a CSV with the following headers: ,,,,,,,,,,)

,,,,id,customer_id,reason,,,,,,,SELECT DISTINCT

,,,,,,CC-Failed-Payments,,,,,,,"fo.subscription_id,"

,,,"Upload CSV file using BOB > Bulk > Import > New > Click ""Browse"" to select file > Under Operation, select ""Subscription Cancel"" > Validate > Click New again > Upload",,,,,,,,,,"fo.customer_id,"

,,,,,,,,,,,,,"soi.sku,"

,3,"In the ""CC KN Reset"" tab, look for new entries from CC (lines without WEEKNUM function), and amend these subscriptions to new tab (i.e. ""W10"")",,,,,,,,,,,fo.delivery_date

,,,,,,,,,,,,,",CASE"

,4,"Send a question via slack #squad-nv-pet-food, to have an engineer pick up this task. ",,,,,,,,,,,WHEN co.total_canceled_orders >= 5 THEN '5+ boxes cancelled'

,,,type in /new_issue,,,,,,,,,,ELSE co.total_canceled_orders

,,,Yes I want to create a new issue,,,,,,,,,,

,,,Issue Title: ,Reset subscriptions to trial,,,,,,,,,

,,,Select topic: Other,,,,,,,,,,END AS total_canceled_orders

,,,Priority:, High,,,,,,,,,from payments_hf.f_orders fo

,,,Description: subscription_ids found in column A of this spreadsheet <Paste link>,,,,,,,,,,LEFT JOIN canceledorders co ON fo.subscription_id = co.subscription_id

,,,Expected Behaviour:,Reset trial to subscription,,,,,,,,,LEFT JOIN dl_bob_live_non_pii.sales_order_item soi ON fo.subscription_id = soi.fk_subscription AND fo.country = soi.business_unit

,Schedule,,Actual Behaviour,Payment errors,,,,,,,,,LEFT JOIN dimensions.product_dimension pd ON soi.sku = pd.product_sku AND soi.business_unit = pd.country

,,"On Tuesday, we want to take the delivery_dates from Saturday to Tuesday (e.g. On Nov 25, 2025, we want to delivery_dates 2025-11-22 to 2025-11-25)",,,,,,,,,,,LEFT JOIN dl_bob_live_non_pii.subscription s ON soi.fk_subscription = s.id_subscription AND soi.business_unit = s.business_unit

,,"On Friday, we want to take the previous delivery_dates from Wednesday to Friday (e.g. On Nov 28, we want delivery_dates 2025-11-26 to 2025-11-28)",,,,,,,,,,,where fo.country = 'KN'

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND customer_loyalty = 0

,,,,,,,,,,,,,"AND latest_status NOT IN ('shipped','money_received')"

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND fo.box_shipped = 0

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND hellofresh_delivery_week >= '2025-W48' --update to current week

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND fo.delivery_date <= '2025-11-25' --update to today's date +1 day

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND fo.dunning_decision = 'cancel'

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND fo.product_type = 'mealbox'

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND pd.is_trialbox IS TRUE

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND soi.sku LIKE 'KN-T%'

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND s.canceled_at IS NULL

,,,,,,,,,,,,,ORDER BY

,,,,,,,,,,,,,total_canceled_orders DESC;

documents.title: Demo Session Sign-Up Sheet
documents.content:
,,,,,,,,,,

Date,Name of the Topic,Brief explanation (max. two sentences),Is it already in production?,Name of the Alliance/Tribe/Squad(s),Name of the Presenter(s),Link to relevant JIRA Ticket / Repository,Preliminary order for meeting ,Video Link,HM Followup,

12/2/2025,Merchandising Widgets,"Configurable merchandising widgets  in the new Elysium store. Markets can self service configure their own banners (essentially ""internal ads"") inside the store to foster menu exploration and promote specific categories. ",Yes,Customer Mega Alliance / Shopping Journey,Thomas Gamper Feitoza Shruti Patil,https://github.com/hellofresh/shared-mobile-modules,2,,x,

12/2/2025,"Deploying services with a brand, country and multi-region variation ","The multi-variant pipeline enables teams to configure and deploy the same application in multiple configurations within a single region, eliminating the need for separate deployments per country or brand. The multi-region pipeline enables teams to deploy their services in 3 regions, Europe, North America, Oceania, reducing the complexity of managing multiple deployments.
",Yes,Release Engineering- Foundations Alliance ,Lobna Naguib Richard Palm,https://github.com/hellofresh/ftcp-open-application-model/commit/9b3c5122a47c152a26229e59f21b1c1441f32927,5,,x,

12/2/2025,Databricks & Unity Catalog Platform Automation,"The current Databricks platform faces infrastructure, governance, and automation challenges, slowing onboarding and limiting features like Iceberg, interoperability, and databricks Compute and GenAI.This project introduces Unity Catalog and automates Databricks infrastructure to strengthen governance and improve team productivity",UAT,Data Streaming and Operations-Foundations Alliance ,Karunai Ragavan S,"https://github.com/hellofresh/databricks-automation
https://hellodev.hellofresh.io/project/databricks/docs/databricks-automation",,,o,

12/2/2025,Ad progression - customized funnels based on value propsitions,"Currently, this is very little connection between the marketing ad that a user clicks on and the conversion funnel. We are testing personalized funnels that dynamically change based on the message of the marketing ad a user clicks on (e.g.; users clicking on a health ad will go through a health-themed conversion funnel). ",Yes,"Conversion Comms Squad, Growth Alliance",Harneet Singh Alvaro Magalhaes,"Statsig 
JIRA (HF) 
JIRA (Factor) 
Slide deck",6,,x,

12/2/2025,Bulk Upload Recipe info in CCM,"The Bulk Upload feature allows you to update large amounts of recipe-level information—specifically pricing details (surcharge, mods), merchandising tags, and labels—for a full menu week using a single CSV file.

Goal: Save you up to X hours of manual configuration per week and keep our menus scalable and accurate.",Yes,Shopping Platform Team - Active Journey Alliance,Priyank Khanna Enrico Carraro João Cheffer Prado Brittney Barnes,CCM Bulk Upload on Menu's Recipes: Quick Start Guide for Editors (Beta),,,o,

12/2/2025,New Cooking Experince on the App ,,,"Growth Alliance, Active Journey Alliance ",Wladimir Gaus Srishti Shah,,1,,,

12/2/2025,Automated Cluster Physical Box Business Marts,"Launching 3 new Business marts covering Physical box concept for operational use cases across Automated Cluster DCs (end-to-end box journey, physical box products and complete BOM)",Yes ,Ops Intelligence/ Analytics Enablement,Alex Goodwin Dragos Simionescu Audrya Kerenhappukh Zauresh Zhumayeva ,https://github.com/hellofresh/ops-intelligence-ae/tree/ae4adfee4e21a973c35a0fe319123991f558fe44/snowflake/dbt/ops_intelligence/models/business_mart/order_creation,,,o,

12/2/2025,FreshChat on Hellodev,"Integrating FreshChat(ChatGpt for Hellofresh) interface into Hellodev to reduce friction, unify the Builder experience and get instant response",Yes,Foundations,TBD,"https://hellodev.hellofresh.io/chat

 Repo: https://github.com/hellofresh/hellodev/tree/master/plugins/fresh-chat",,,x,

12/2/2025,Olympus: Image RAG for Concorde,TBA,Yes,Operations Mega Alliance / Menu-To-Content + ML SOlutions,Benjamin Bertincourt Louis Lippmann,https://github.com/hellofresh/mls-genai-solutions,3,,x,

12/2/2025,P500 Funnel & Menu Personalization,"A new questionnaire where we ask prospects for their meal preferences like rating their proteins and cuisines, letting us know of ingredients to avoid, and nutrition goals.

Using this data that we're now storing, we've partnered with squad personalization to provide customers with a more personalized set of menu defaults and menu ranking.",Yes - Experiment,"Growth Mega Alliance / Conversions Tribe / Funnel Squad

Food Systems Alliance / Menu Personalization Tribe / Squad Personalization",Marie Crumpton Tommaso Cremonini Michael Johnson Alejandra Garcia Ashwin Samtani,"Jira Epic
Figma
Working Doc
Slide deck",4,,,x

1/13/2026,Menu Search,"To support menu discovery for P500, we built and launched a web-only MVP menu search feature for Chefs Plate, ran successful non-inferiority experiments in CK, CA and US and are now live for 100% in these markets. We gathered behavioral and survey data about how users use full text search to discover recipes.","Yes (CK, CA, US)",Consumer Mega Alliance,Stefano Palazzo Tushar Raina,https://github.com/hellofresh/web/blob/master/app/spaces/store/modules/food/shared/components/search,,,,
